templates.name: Nginx
templates.description:
Get metrics from stub status module using Zabbix agent running on Linux
https://nginx.ru/en/docs/http/ngx_http_stub_status_module.html

This template automatically subtractts the Active and Writing connection values from the status check for more accurate statistics gathering. It also shows how many worker processes are running as opposed to the master.

This is designed specifically for https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-nginx/

items.name: Nginx: Connections accepted per second
items.description: The total number of accepted client connections.

items.name: Nginx: Connections active
items.description: The current number of active client connections including Waiting connections.

items.name: Nginx: Connections dropped per second
items.description: The total number of dropped client connections.

triggers.name: Nginx: High connections drop rate (more than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for 5m)
triggers.description: The dropping rate connections is greater than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for the last 5 minutes.

items.name: Nginx: Connections handled per second
items.description: The total number of handled connections. Generally, the parameter value is the same as accepts unless some resource limits have been reached (for example, the worker_connections limit).

items.name: Nginx: Connections reading
items.description: The current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header.

items.name: Nginx: Connections waiting
items.description: The current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.

items.name: Nginx: Connections writing
items.description: The current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client.

items.name: Nginx: Requests total
items.description: The total number of client requests.

items.name: Nginx: Requests per second
items.description: The total number of client requests.

triggers.name: Nginx: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
triggers.description: Nginx version has changed. Ack to close.

items.name: Nginx: CPU utilization
items.description: Process CPU utilization percentage.

items.name: Nginx: Memory usage (rss)
items.description: Resident set size memory used by process in bytes.

items.name: Nginx: Memory usage (vsize)
items.description: Virtual memory size used by process in bytes.

items.name: Nginx: Number of master processes
items.description: Number of the Nginx master processes running.

items.name: Nginx: Number of worker processes
items.description: Number of the Nginx worker processes running.

items.name: Nginx: Get stub status page
items.description:
The following status information is provided:
Active connections - the current number of active client connections including Waiting connections.
Accepts - the total number of accepted client connections.
Handled - the total number of handled connections. Generally, the parameter value is the same as accepts unless some resource limits have been reached (for example, the worker_connections limit).
Requests - the total number of client requests.
Reading - the current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header.
Writing - the current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client.
Waiting - the current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.
https://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_stub_status_module.html

triggers.name: Nginx: Failed to fetch stub status page (or no data for 30m)
triggers.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

macros.description: The critical rate of the dropped connections for trigger expression.
The Nginx maximum response time in seconds for trigger expression.
Hostname or IP of Nginx stub_status host or container.
The path of Nginx stub_status page.
The port of Nginx stub_status host or container.

templates.name: Nginx - Passive Monitoring
templates.description:
Get metrics from stub status module using Zabbix agent running on Linux
https://nginx.ru/en/docs/http/ngx_http_stub_status_module.html

This template automatically subtracts the Active and Writing connection values from the status check for more accurate statistics gathering. It also shows how many worker processes are running as opposed to the master.

This is designed specifically for https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-nginx/

triggers.name: Nginx: Service response time is too high (over {$NGINX.RESPONSE_TIME.MAX.WARN}s for 5m)

items.name: Nginx: Connections accepted per second
items.description: The total number of accepted client connections.

items.name: Nginx: Connections active
items.description: The current number of active client connections including Waiting connections.

items.name: Nginx: Connections dropped per second
items.description: The total number of dropped client connections.

triggers.name: Nginx: High connections drop rate (more than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for 5m)
triggers.description: The dropping rate connections is greater than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for the last 5 minutes.

items.name: Nginx: Connections handled per second
items.description: The total number of handled connections. Generally, the parameter value is the same as accepts unless some resource limits have been reached (for example, the worker_connections limit).

items.name: Nginx: Connections reading
items.description: The current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header.

items.name: Nginx: Connections waiting
items.description: The current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.

items.name: Nginx: Connections writing
items.description: The current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client.

items.name: Nginx: Requests total
items.description: The total number of client requests.

items.name: Nginx: Requests per second
items.description: The total number of client requests.

triggers.expression: last(/Nginx - Passive Monitoring/nginx.version,#1)<>last(/Nginx - Passive Monitoring/nginx.version,#2) and length(last(/Nginx - Passive Monitoring/nginx.version))>0
triggers.name: Nginx: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
triggers.description: Nginx version has changed. Ack to close.

items.name: Nginx: CPU utilization
items.description: Process CPU utilization percentage.

items.name: Nginx: Memory usage (rss)
items.description: Resident set size memory used by process in bytes.

items.name: Nginx: Memory usage (vsize)
items.description: Virtual memory size used by process in bytes.

items.name: Nginx: Number of master processes
items.description: Number of the Nginx master processes running.

items.name: Nginx: Number of worker processes
items.description: Number of the Nginx worker processes running.

items.name: Nginx: Get stub status page
items.description:
The following status information is provided:
Active connections - the current number of active client connections including Waiting connections.
Accepts - the total number of accepted client connections.

Requests - the total number of client requests.
Reading - the current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header.
Writing - the current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client.
Waiting - the current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.
https://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_stub_status_module.html

triggers.name: Nginx: Failed to fetch stub status page (or no data for 30m)
triggers.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.
